name: Magical ruins
description:
Game (prototype) for 5 minutes. You need to collect crystals, activate obelisks with them and teleport.

Control:

UP    - forward

DOWN  - backward

RIGHT -right

LEFT  - left

E     - use (open the chest, take the stone, turn on the teleport)

1,2,3 -  get the crystal from inventory.


For the game I used aasets https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-top-down-basic
